ModMetaData.name: Long Pig Automation
ModMetaData.author: Karl Beisel
ModMetaData.description: Automates vanilla Biotech growth-vat workflows to streamline large scale production of human meat: - Automatically orders ejected infants back into growth vats via normal work jobs. - Assigns newborns utilitarian ID-based names instead of normal human names and suppresses the naming dialog. - Automatically resolves child growth-moment choice letters without showing the dialog.
